title: Introduction to Machine Learning
content: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn from data without being explicitly programmed. Neural networks and deep learning are powerful techniques.

title: Deep Learning with Neural Networks
content: Deep learning uses artificial neural networks with multiple layers to process complex patterns. Convolutional neural networks excel at image recognition tasks.

title: Natural Language Processing Basics
content: NLP allows computers to understand and generate human language. Transformers and large language models have revolutionized text processing and generation.

title: Computer Vision Applications
content: Computer vision enables machines to interpret visual information from the world. Object detection, facial recognition, and image segmentation are common applications.

title: Java Programming Fundamentals
content: Java is a popular object-oriented programming language. Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and the JVM.

title: Python for Data Science
content: Python is the go-to language for data science and machine learning. Libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-learn make data analysis easy.

title: JavaScript Modern Development
content: Modern JavaScript development with ES6+, React, and Node.js. Build full-stack web applications with asynchronous programming and REST APIs.

title: SQL Database Design
content: Learn relational database design principles, normalization, indexing, and query optimization. Master SQL joins, aggregations, and transactions.

title: NoSQL and MongoDB
content: NoSQL databases offer flexible schema and horizontal scalability. MongoDB stores documents in JSON-like format, perfect for modern applications.

title: Apache Solr Search Engine
content: Solr is a powerful open-source search platform built on Apache Lucene. It provides full-text search, faceting, and now supports vector search for semantic similarity.

title: AWS Cloud Computing
content: Amazon Web Services provides scalable cloud infrastructure. Learn about EC2, S3, Lambda, and building serverless applications on AWS.

title: Docker and Kubernetes
content: Containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes. Deploy and scale microservices applications in cloud environments.

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
content: Artificial intelligence encompasses machine learning, computer vision, natural language processing, and robotics. AI systems can perceive, reason, and take actions.

title: Large Language Models and ChatGPT
content: GPT and other large language models are trained on vast amounts of text data. They can generate coherent text, answer questions, and assist with various tasks.

title: AI Ethics and Responsible AI
content: Ethical considerations in artificial intelligence development. Bias, fairness, transparency, privacy, and the societal impact of AI systems.
